statements: SELECT * FROM land_parcel_ownership;
SELECT parcel_id, owner_name, property_value FROM land_parcel_ownership;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE property_value > 50000;
SELECT * FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE last_tax_assessment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, property_value FROM land_parcel_ownership ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY owner_name DESC, last_tax_assessment_date ASC
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE property_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT * FROM land_parcel_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT AVG(property_value) AS avg_property_value, MAX(property_value) AS max_property_value FROM land_parcel_ownership
SELECT owner_name, owner_address, DATE_PART('year', age(last_tax_assessment_date)) AS years_since_last_assessment FROM land_parcel_ownership ORDER BY years_since_last_assessment ASC
SELECT * FROM LandParcelOwners;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM LandParcelOwners WHERE parcel_size > 1000;
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_value FROM PropertyAssessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, parcel_size FROM LandParcelOwners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_value, assessment_date FROM PropertyAssessments WHERE assessed_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandParcelOwners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT parcel_id, owner_name, parcel_size FROM LandParcelOwners ORDER BY parcel_size DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM LandParcelOwners WHERE parcel_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyAssessments WHERE assessed_value >= 500000 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, parcel_id, assessed_value, assessment_date FROM PropertyAssessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LandParcel
SELECT owner_name, parcel_area FROM LandParcel
SELECT owner_name, parcel_area FROM LandParcel WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM OwnershipHistory ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT owner_name, assessed_value FROM LandParcel JOIN PropertyTaxAssessment ON LandParcel.parcel_id = PropertyTaxAssessment.parcel_id
SELECT * FROM LandParcel WHERE parcel_area > 1000
SELECT owner_name, parcel_area FROM LandParcel ORDER BY parcel_area DESC
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name FROM OwnershipHistory WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM LandParcel JOIN OwnershipHistory ON LandParcel.parcel_id = OwnershipHistory.parcel_id
SELECT parcel_id, assessed_value FROM PropertyTaxAssessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY assessed_value
SELECT * FROM LandParcel;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM LandParcel;
SELECT * FROM PropertyTaxAssessment WHERE assessed_value > 10000;
SELECT parcel_id, decision_date, decision_description FROM PlanningDecisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM OwnershipHistory WHERE previous_owner_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LandParcel;
SELECT parcel_number, owner_name FROM LandParcel WHERE owner_address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT * FROM PropertyTaxAssessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, decision_description FROM LandParcel JOIN PlanningDecisions ON LandParcel.id = PlanningDecisions.parcel_id;
SELECT DISTINCT previous_owner_name FROM OwnershipHistory WHERE ownership_end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LandOwners;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM LandOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT property_address, property_size FROM Properties ORDER BY property_size DESC;
SELECT tax_id, tax_amount, tax_year FROM Taxes WHERE tax_amount > 10000;
SELECT assessment_id, property_id, assessment_date, assessment_value FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_value < 5000;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address, property_value FROM LandOwners INNER JOIN Properties ON LandOwners.property_id = Properties.property_id

SELECT owner_name, property_address, tax_amount FROM LandOwners JOIN Properties ON LandOwners.property_id = Properties.property_id JOIN Taxes ON Properties.property_id = Taxes.property_id WHERE Taxes.tax_year = 2021
SELECT * FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_value > 5000 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC

SELECT owner_name, property_address, assessment_value FROM LandOwners INNER JOIN Properties ON LandOwners.property_id = Properties.property_id INNER JOIN Assessments ON Properties.property_id = Assessments.property_id
SELECT property_address, decision_details FROM Properties LEFT JOIN PlanningDecisions ON Properties.property_id = PlanningDecisions.property_id
